bug.author: lightlefter
bug.summary: I can't use tensorflow very well by using RTX 3090,When will you updata your new version to support the new RTX3090?
bug.description: I can't use tensorflow very well by using RTX 3090,When will you updata your version to support the new RTX3090? <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/73739019/97775960-a5f26700-1b5c-11eb-8cdd-f54eae8ee9d4.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/lightlefter>@lightlefter</denchmark-link>
please refer tot he issues in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/44490#issuecomment-720277302>this comment</denchmark-link> regarding "RTX 3090" and let us know.

我也有同样的问题。
I have the same problem.
I had deal with this problem,you need use tf2 command to restrain video memory

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/lightlefter>@lightlefter</denchmark-link>
Please move the issue to closed status if resolved.
